summary: The diff implements most requirements: REQ-5 (new stage labels throughout UI), REQ-6 (per-stage visual processing pipeline), REQ-7 (updated captions in GalleryView, HowItWorks, Home), and REQ-8 (backend stage names updated in main.mo). The Drawing Guide walkthrough component is not visible in the diff, creating uncertainty about REQ-5/REQ-7 coverage there. The five required image assets are referenced but not added to the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Drawing Guide walkthrough stage titles and captions reflect the new stage names
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show a DrawingGuide component being modified. No DrawingGuide.tsx or equivalent component appears in the modified files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Drawing Guide walkthrough captions are updated
missing_requirements.reason: No DrawingGuide component file appears in the modified files, so its captions cannot be confirmed updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Fallback image paths (e.g., stage1-basic-outline.dim_800x800.png, stage2-reference-sketch.dim_800x800.png) referenced in Home.tsx stageDetails that were not requested in the build spec
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only specifies the five new 600x600 portrait drawing stage images. The fallback image paths pointing to 800x800 assets were not requested.
